channel.title: Creating custom consumable items?
channel.description:
Hello there. I'm having a few problems creating a custom potion. I've already added it in my clients class8 and done all the source work, including the effect, a timer, and whatnot. The problem is: whenever I drink it, it instead wields it as a weapon. I've already implemented the deletion of the item as you would with any potion (mine is is potions.java), but I cant figure out why it doesn't delete the potion and cause the effect to occur and instead wields it. Any ideas?
Your help is much appreciated!
